languages.text: "Амарнат не отрицал ни один конкретный запрет, но их кумулятивный эффект находил гнетущим. Комплекс жестких ограничений сузил пространство познания до закольцованной колеи, в которой разум обречен. И этот цикл повторений должен был быть разрушен. Потому его назвали Мессией Прерывания".

"Amarnat did not reject any one specific prohibition but found their cumulative effect to be oppressive. The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."
languages.original_text: "Амарнат не отрицал ни один конкретный запрет, но их кумулятивный эффект находил гнетущим. Комплекс жестких ограничений сузил пространство познания до закольцованной колеи, в которой разум обречен. И этот цикл повторений должен был быть разрушен. Потому его назвали Мессией Прерывания".

The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."

languages.text: “阿玛纳特并没有否定任何一条具体的禁令，但他发现，一旦这些禁令累计在一起，便会带来压迫。那些僵化的限制，将知识的寻求者限制在往复循环的轨道上，为渴望思考的头脑带来了灾祸。这种重复的循环必须被打破，因此他才会自称‘终结的弥赛亚’。”
languages.original_text: "Amarnat did not reject any one specific prohibition but found their cumulative effect to be oppressive. The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."

traits.locale_text: “阿玛纳特并没有否定任何一条具体的禁令，但他发现，一旦这些禁令累计在一起，便会带来压迫。那些僵化的限制，将知识的寻求者限制在往复循环的轨道上，为渴望思考的头脑带来了灾祸。这种重复的循环必须被打破，因此他才会自称‘终结的弥赛亚’。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Amarnat no rechazaba ninguna prohibición concreta, pero su efecto acumulado le resultaba opresivo. El sistema de limitaciones rígidas confinaba a los buscadores de conocimiento, atrapándolos en una ruta circular que condenaba a las mentes pensantes. Era necesario romper el círculo de repeticiones. Por eso le llamaron el Mesías de la Discontinuidad».
languages.original_text: "Amarnat did not reject any one specific prohibition but found their cumulative effect to be oppressive. The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."

traits.locale_text: «Amarnat no rechazaba ninguna prohibición concreta, pero su efecto acumulado le resultaba opresivo. El sistema de limitaciones rígidas confinaba a los buscadores de conocimiento, atrapándolos en una ruta circular que condenaba a las mentes pensantes. Era necesario romper el círculo de repeticiones. Por eso le llamaron el Mesías de la Discontinuidad».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「アマルナトは、特定の禁止事項を拒否したわけではなく、その累積効果が抑圧的であることに気づいたのだ。厳格な制限のシステムは、知識の探求者を円環状の軌道に閉じ込め、思考する心に破滅を告げていた。その繰り返しのサイクルを断ち切らなければならなかった。だからこそ、彼は廃絶の救世主と呼ばれたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Amarnat did not reject any one specific prohibition but found their cumulative effect to be oppressive. The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."

traits.locale_text: 「アマルナトは、特定の禁止事項を拒否したわけではなく、その累積効果が抑圧的であることに気づいたのだ。厳格な制限のシステムは、知識の探求者を円環状の軌道に閉じ込め、思考する心に破滅を告げていた。その繰り返しのサイクルを断ち切らなければならなかった。だからこそ、彼は廃絶の救世主と呼ばれたのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Amarnat hat nicht ein bestimmtes Verbot abgelehnt, sondern fand ihren kumulativen Effekt erdrückend. Das System der rigiden Beschränkungen hatte alle, die nach Wissen suchen, auf eine Rundbahn geführt, die sie nicht verlassen konnten — der Untergang für den denkenden Verstand. Und dieser repetitive Zyklus musste durchbrochen werden. Darum wurde er Messias der Unterbrechung genannt."
languages.original_text: "Amarnat did not reject any one specific prohibition but found their cumulative effect to be oppressive. The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat hat nicht ein bestimmtes Verbot abgelehnt, sondern fand ihren kumulativen Effekt erdrückend. Das System der rigiden Beschränkungen hatte alle, die nach Wissen suchen, auf eine Rundbahn geführt, die sie nicht verlassen konnten — der Untergang für den denkenden Verstand. Und dieser repetitive Zyklus musste durchbrochen werden. Darum wurde er Messias der Unterbrechung genannt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Amarnat ne rejetait aucune interdiction en particulier, mais il voyait une oppression dans leur effet cumulatif. À cause de ces limites rigides, ceux qui cherchaient le savoir se trouvaient confinés sur une voie circulaire qui condamnait les esprits curieux à disparaître. C'est ce cycle de répétition qu'il fallait briser, et c'est pour cette raison qu'il fut surnommé le Messie de l'Interruption. »
languages.original_text: "Amarnat did not reject any one specific prohibition but found their cumulative effect to be oppressive. The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."

traits.locale_text: « Amarnat ne rejetait aucune interdiction en particulier, mais il voyait une oppression dans leur effet cumulatif. À cause de ces limites rigides, ceux qui cherchaient le savoir se trouvaient confinés sur une voie circulaire qui condamnait les esprits curieux à disparaître. C'est ce cycle de répétition qu'il fallait briser, et c'est pour cette raison qu'il fut surnommé le Messie de l'Interruption. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Amarnat did not reject any one specific prohibition but found their cumulative effect to be oppressive. The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."

languages.text: "Amarnat belirli bir yasağı reddetmedi, yasakların hep birlikte meydana getirdiği etkiyi baskılayıcı buldu. Sıkı sınırlamaların bulunduğu sistem, irfan peşinde koşanları kısır bir döngüye sokar. Bu da düşünen bir zihin için ölüm demektir. Tekerrür döngüsü kırılmalıdır. Bozulum Mesihi olarak anılmasının sebebi de budur."
languages.original_text: "Amarnat did not reject any one specific prohibition but found their cumulative effect to be oppressive. The system of rigid limitations had confined seekers of knowledge to a circular track, spelling doom for the thinking mind. And that cycle of repetition had to be broken. That was why he was dubbed the Messiah of Discontinuing."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat herhangi spesifik bir yasağı reddetmedi, onların toplamda meydana getirdiği etkiyi baskılayıcı buldu. Sıkı sınırlamaların bulunduğu sistem, irfan peşinde koşanları daire biçiminde bir yola sokar, bu da düşünen bir zihin için ölüm demektir. Bu tekerrür dairesi kırılmalıdır. Devamsızlık Mesihi olarak anılmasının sebebi de budur."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
